# 10 Best ChatGPT WordPress Plugins to Use Today!

Looking for the best ChatGPT WordPress plugins to bring AI to your website?
This post lists the top ChatGPT plugins to put on your WordPress site today!

**Approximate read time:** 5.5 minutes

ChatGPT is trending more than viral TikTok videos.

And people are scrambling to use its powers on their WordPress websites. And,
if you’re reading this post, you’re likely one of them.

Luckily we’ve made it easier than ever with this list of the best ChatGPT
WordPress plugins.

Get Better Forms FREE!



From content creation to chatbots, it’s all here.

So let’s dive into it.

## **Why use a ChatGPT plugin for WordPress?** ?

A ChatGPT plugin can be helpful in various ways.

For starters, there isn't a WordPress plugin for ChatGPT from OpenAI. (That's
why you're here to find the best plugins for ChatGPT, remember?)

But the benefits go beyond that. Depending on the ChatGPT plugin, you can:

  * **Create smarter forms** ?
  * **Use it as acontent generator** ✍️
  * **Fix yourSearch Engine Optimization (SEO)** ?
  * **Use achatbot for customers** ?
  * **Automate your work** ?

For example, here's a tutor assistant we designed using Formidable Forms:

This is perfect for schools or academies. But this can be applied to any
situation to meet your needs.

So, now that you know why you'd use a ChatGPT plugin, let’s get to the best
ones ?

## 7 **Best ChatGPT WordPress plugins** ?

  1. Formidable Forms
  2. All in One SEO (AIOSEO)
  3. Uncanny Automator
  4. AI Engine
  5. GPT AI Power
  6. WPForms
  7. AI Content Writing Assistant
  8. AI Assistant with ChatGPT
  9. AI ChatBot
  10. AI Post Generator

### **1.** **Formidable Forms**

**Rating** : 4.7 stars (945+ reviews) | 300,000+ active installations

Formidable Forms is a fantastic plugin that helps people easily create
incredible forms.

With a drag and drop form builder, you can easily add fields, customize the
layout, and add advanced features which expand what your form can do.

One standout feature (and why it’s the best ChatGPT plugin) is its integration
with ChatGPT! So, with a simple form field, you can have a form that connects
with your website visitors and assists them however you need.

You can add an assistant to answer real-time questions, provide customer
support, or recommend educational resources. These real-time responses go a
long way toward increasing your engagement rates.

You also get impressive features like AI Templates, conditional logic, payment
integrations, and more.

So your form becomes a lead magnet instead of a simple form! If you're looking
for a simple & powerful way to add AI to your website, this is it.

To see what we mean, check the YouTube video below:

Subscribe on YouTube

Ready to supercharge your WordPress website? Formidable can help.

#### **Pricing** ?

Formidable Forms offers a free version. But you must have at least a Business
Plan to access its AI field.

Try It Out Now!

### **2.**All in One SEO (AIOSEO)

**Rating** : 4.7 stars (3940+ reviews) | 3+ million active installations

SEO not your strong suit?

That's alright, AIOSEO is here to make you look like a pro. While it has many
features to help improve your SEO, like content recommendations and rank
tracking, we're here for AI.

And that's where it flies in with a cape to save the day.

Imagine all those times you were stumped for a post title or meta description.
Everything you typed in quickly went to the trash can ?. You spent _way
longer_ on the task than you should have. But no longer!

AIOSEO's AI generates ideas **for you**. We use AIOSEO ourselves, and here's
what it came up with for this post you're reading:

So, if you're ready to kiss copywriters goodbye, AIOSEO is ready to get hired
?‍?.

Plus, its other features, like its link reader to find broken links, real time
data, and more, make it a solid call for your website.

#### **Pricing** ?

AIOSEO has a free and premium plugin. Premium plans start at $49/year.

### 3\. Uncanny Automator

**Rating** : 4.9 stars (105+ reviews) | 20,000+ active installations

Uncanny Automator is amazing.

And that's why we use it for our daily tasks. If you're unfamiliar with it,
strap yourself in.

Uncanny Automator helps automate tasks between two plugins. For example, let's
say you have an eCommerce site, and you want to add a customer's email to your
ActiveCampaign every time they purchase a product. That way, you can send them
a personalized thank you (and even recommend some more products).

So, you create the automation that does it. No more manually adding emails or
sending them.

One automation. Set it and forget it.

And that's even more powerful when you connect it to ChatGPT to simplify your
workflow. After all, Uncanny Automator connects to _hundreds_ of plugins. Just
think of the possibilities with your own website!

#### **Pricing** ?

Uncanny Automator has a free and premium plugin. Premium plans start at
$149/year.

### 4\. **AI Engine**

**Rating** : 4.9 stars (370+ reviews) | 30,000+ active installations

AI Engine gives you various AI tools.

From a chatbot to creating content and media, AI Engine helps you grow your
website in multiple ways.

It also supports popular AI models like ChatGPT, GPT3, and GPT4, so you get
the latest information and advancements. Its features, like AI Copilot, help
you translate, correct, and optimize your content for search engines. You can
even post to social media using its Social Engine feature.

Overall, it’s a powerful plugin to help expand your website and engagement
methods.

#### **Pricing** ?

AI Engine has a free and premium plugin. Premium plans start at $49.

? **Check out the best AI plugins for WordPress!:**9 Best AI Plugins for
WordPress to Boost Your Website

### **5.** **GPT AI Power**

**Rating** : 4.7 stars (125+ reviews) | 10,000+ active installations

AI Power is an excellent WordPress plugin that uses OpenAI’s GPT natural
language processing (NLP) model.

This model helps you create content that sounds like a human, making it more
engaging. You can also generate images and videos, add a chat widget, and more
with the plugin.

And, to make it even better, it integrates with other top services like Yoast,
All In One SEO, and Rank Math to help expand your abilities.

With all the ways AI is in our everyday life, this is just another
(productive) way to use it.

#### **Pricing** ?

AI Power has a free plan and a premium plan. Premium plans start at $7.99.

### **6.**WPForms

**Rating** : 4.9 stars (13140+ reviews) | 5+ million active installations

WPForms is one of the most popular plugins on WordPress thanks to its
beginner-friendly interface.

It's simple and takes almost no time to pick up and use. And the same is true
for its ChatGPT integration.

So, like Formidable Forms, you can make your forms work smarter for you while
you (don't) work harder. For example, you can create a form so customers can
get answers to easy questions. Or create an outline generator for your content
team that speeds up their workflow.

The one downside is that it requires Uncanny Automator to connect to ChatGPT.

#### **Pricing** ?

WPForms has a free and premium plugin. Premium plans start at $49.50/year.

### 7\. **AI Content Writing Assistant**

**Rating** : 4.9 stars (25+ reviews) | 4,000+ active installations

The AI Content Writing Assistant is the perfect plugin for all things content.

In just a few minutes, you can have blog posts and unique images to take your
website to the next level. And it uses GPT-3, so your content uses a natural
language model and is engaging and human-like. You can even use the images
generator to create your featured image for your post!

Whether you’re a blogger, marketer, or business owner, you’ve found the
content writer for your website.

#### **Pricing** ?

AI Content Writing Assistant is entirely free on WordPress.org.

### **8.** **AI Assistant with ChatGPT**

**Rating** : 5 stars (5+ reviews) | 80+ active installations

AI Assistant with ChatGPT is great for helping you _and_ your users.

With one simple plugin, you can have all your questions answered in the back
end of your website, like “How do I post on WordPress?” or “How do I
enable/disable a theme?” And ChatGPT will quickly answer for you. And it acts
like a simple menu item in your dashboard.

But it doesn’t stop there. You can also have it generate content from the chat
window, answer questions, and even give you a text-to-speech response!

However, you will need your API key to set up the AI-powered chatbot.

Plus, having a quick ChatGPT tutorial wouldn't hurt if you’re unfamiliar with
how it works.

#### **Pricing** ?

AI Assistant with ChatGPT has a free and premium version. Premium plans start
at $49 for a lifetime license.

### **9.** **AI ChatBot**

**Rating** : 4.8 stars (85+ reviews) | 4,000+ active installations

If you don’t need all the content creation features and _just_ want a chatbot,
then AI ChatBot is perfect!

With a simple plug n’ play setup, you can have a chatbot on your website for
visitors within minutes…and no coding is needed! Plus, you can add to it by
adding your own FAQs and customized responses, or just let it work on its own!

Either way, it’s a great way to interact with customers. And all you have to
do is install the plugin.

#### **Pricing** ?

AI ChatBot has a free and premium version. Premium plans start at $49/year.

? **Stuck figuring out how to use AI on your website?:**10 Creative AI
Examples to Make You Say Wow!

### **10.** **AI Post Generator**

**Rating** : 5 stars (3+ reviews) | 1,000+ active installations

AI Post Generator claims it was the first of its kind.

But that doesn’t mean it's missing any features that newer plugins have. Using
its artificial intelligence, you can create high-quality blog posts based on
the title! It’ll generate the headers for you, help you find images for your
post, and then save it as a draft or publish it straight to your site.

So, if you need content generation quickly, AI Post Generator is perfect.

#### **Pricing** ?

AI Post Generator gives you a set of free posts. After, you have to pay for
tokens to create more content.

## **Which WordPress ChatGPT plugin will you use?**

So, on a scale of 1-10, how excited are you?

ChatGPT plugins give you a HUGE chance to grow your website quicker than
before. And now all it takes is learning how to use AI on your WordPress site!

Try Formidable Forms!

So, we’re curious to hear from you. Which of the top ChatGPT plugins will you
choose? Let us know in the comments!

And follow us on Facebook, Twitter, and YouTube for more great Chat GPT
WordPress plugin tips and tricks!
